name: vibes-cli
description: A CLI tool for Specs Driven Development (SDD) that transforms raw human requirements into structured AI-ready specs and generative prompts.
objectives: Allow developers to convert unstructured text requirements into standardized JSON or YAML specifications.
Generate contextual AI prompts that can be directly used by LLMs for code generation.
Provide modular and extensible architecture for custom domains (frontend, backend, infra, testing).

commands.name: init
commands.description: Initialize a new vibes project with default configuration.

options.description: Initialize with a predefined domain template.

commands.name: generate
commands.description: Parse raw requirement text and produce a structured spec file.

options.description: Specify input text or markdown file.
Define the domain (frontend, backend, infra, etc.).

commands.name: prompt
commands.description: Generate AI prompt from an existing spec file.

options.description: Choose AI model (gpt-5, claude, llama, etc.).

commands.name: run
commands.description: Execute AI code generation using the generated prompt.

options.description: Specify the spec file to execute.

folders.core: Houses main logic for parsing, transforming, and executing specs.
folders.templates: Default spec templates for each domain.
folders.types: Type definitions for specs and prompts.
folders.utils: Helper functions such as logging, file I/O, etc.

spec_example.name: todo-app-generator
spec_example.description: Generate a todo app with CRUD functionality.
requirements: User can add, edit, and delete tasks.

prompt.instruction: Generate Angular components and services based on this spec.
